sentences.sContent: Shoot the red ball with a humanoid cannonball.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shoot the red ball with a humanoid cannonball.
sentences.sCn: 用类似人形的炮弹射击红色的求。

sentences.sContent: There are exceptions to this rule: The cannonball jellyfish—a seafood delicacy in Asia—shoots through the water at 15 centimeters per second, a decent clip.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are exceptions to this rule: The cannonball jellyfish—a seafood delicacy in Asia—shoots through the water at 15 centimeters per second, a decent clip.
sentences.sCn: 当然也有例外，比如亚洲的一种美味海鲜“炮弹水母”，就能以每秒15厘米的速度在水中穿梭，看起来像把水流剪开一样。

sentences.sContent: Look at picture of cannonball flight and you will see they will describe it like this , as though at the end of the flight its dropping almost vertically.
sentences.sContent_eng: Look at picture of cannonball flight and you will see they will describe it like this , as though at the end of the flight its dropping almost vertically.
sentences.sCn: 仔细看下炮弹的飞行路线,你会发现它们是这样运动的，但是炮弹在最后的落地阶段几乎是垂直的。

trans.tranOther: a heavy iron ball fired from a cannon
